Name: YiYi
About the game: This is a broken dream ...... is also a gentle persistence. Yi Yi. I'm coming, I'm coming to find you. ---------------------------------------------- “Yi Yi' is a short visual novel, developed by me independently. Here, you will play the role of the protagonist 'GUI', to a city of eternal night. This city has an eternal quiet moonlight night, but not a single bright sky light. And the 'GUI' is you, not anyone. You feel that you have been to this place before, so you have been looking here ...... Until you meet Yi Yi. 'Is that you?' 'It's me.' You have finally come. Now, I am finally able to sincerely invite you into my dreams. Happy dreaming.
